----------------- 1.Description -----------------
Washed ashore on the Hamlet coast, the Fool is lost in a haze, impossible to communicate with. Impaled by a spear to a small corpse by some strange indefeasible ritual, she desires only for the child's salvation. She wants to free the poor unknown little wretched soul, and she will die trying, again and again. And it will never be done.
The Fool is a twisted stealthy heavy hitter.

----------------- 2.Known Issues -----------------
//All included > No need for additional patches unlike Muscarine's other characters, the Fool has the complete package. Does not require CC or CoM, but those trinkets will not spawn without the relevant DLC.
//Boobs > Palette A for the normal mod > Palette B for SFW
//Despair
This move is meant for killing the Fool if you end up in a battle that's unwinnable because the Fool is your last living hero and retreat is disabled. This can only occur in the following places:
Shrieker Fight DD3 and DD4 Camping Ambushes
It CANNOT occur during flashbacks. Don't use it if you're not 100% certain you're stuck.
If she's in "combat mode" (other skills besides Wail available) it moves her back one rank with no ill effects. If she's in "Wail mode" it damages her and debuffs her healing received; spam it in order to kill her if softlocked.

----------------- 4.Changelog - see patch notes linked above for more detail -----------------
1.1 - added Death Whistle to avoid softlocks, added 10% Stress debuff to party on death
1.2 - updated Death Whistle for clarity, Banshee now applies -10 SPD debuff, Fool base SPD lowered by 2, Broken Lyre now inflicts 5 Stress on kill rather than healing stress, The Dead's Mouth heal from 3 to 2
1.3 - Death Whistle removed, Move skill replaced with Suicide to avoid softlocks
1.4 - updated Suicide to Despair to mitigate accidental suicides but still prevent softlocks, also now allows her to move back 1; The Dead's Mouth no longer heals
1.5 - +1 DMG, Wail Blight from 3/3/4/4/5 to 3/3/4/5/6, First Circle is now a free action but debuffs your next attack, Downpour and Burrowing Blight/Debuff Chance increased by 10%
1.6 - Fifth Circle DMG mod now 10% at all levels, fixed tooltips, Weeping Song is now a guaranteed stealth + "taunt", Banshee stun chance increased by 5%, Celtic Knot Blight Amount reduced by 15%, added barks, fixed bugs
